message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $7500 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $8200.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my research and budget, I would like to propose a price of $8000 for the product.
I'm glad we're still in negotiations, Bob. I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I'm willing to compromise. I'm now offering the product to you for $8100.
